title: Numerical Analysis
text:
Reference textbooks
The course is based on two books:

An Introduction to Numerical Analysis, by Süli and Mayers. See here
Numerical Mathematics, by Quarteroni. See here

title: Useful links
text:
Below are some useful videos to learn about Julia:

Intro to Julia tutorial (version 1.0) by Jane Herriman
Introductory notebooks to Julia.
The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Multiple Dispatch
More details on one of the strong points of Julia : “multiple dispatch”.

title: Lecture notes
text:
Lecture notes

Complete notes
Introduction
Chapter 1: Floating point arithmetic
Chapter 2: Interpolation and approximation
Chapter 3: Numerical integration
Chapter 4: Solving linear equations
Chapter 5: Solving nonlinear equations
Chapter 6: Calculating eigenvalues and eigenvectors
Chapter 7: Numerical integration of differential equations
Chapter 8: Numerical optimization

Appendix B: Introduction to Julia
